titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of the Ira D. MacLachlan Post Numbered 3, the American Legion, Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to use a certain parcel of land.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

bill.summary: 3/15/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to renew the license of a named American Legion post in Michigan to use a certain parcel of land.
